description.original: A plugin to make your canvas work like a mindmap.
description.translation: A plugin to make your canvas work like a mindmap.

dict.Notice(\"You can only create sibling nod: Notice("You can only create sibling node for non-root node")
dict.name:\"Split Heading into mindmap based: name:"Split Heading into mindmap based on H1"
dict.text:\"You can use the hotkey to navigat: text:"You can use the hotkey to navigate the mind map."
dict.text:\"You can change the hotkey mode to: text:"You can change the hotkey mode to control how you edit the node."
dict.text:\"You can resize the node when you: text:"You can resize the node when you edit the node."
dict.text:'Notice: if you already have \"Node: text:'Notice: if you already have "Node Auto Resize" plugin enabled, you can ignore this setting.'
dict..setText(\"Alt+Arrow: Select nearest nod: .setText("Alt+Arrow: Select nearest node in the direction")
dict..setDesc(\"If you like this plugin, cons: .setDesc("If you like this plugin, consider donating to support continued development:")
dict..setDesc(\"Auto show the changelog of th: .setDesc("Auto show the changelog of the plugin when the plugin is updated.")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the layout of the mind ma: .setDesc("Set the layout of the mind map. Notice: any changes will take effect after creating a new node/deleting a node.")
dict..setDesc(\"Set the direction of the mind: .setDesc("Set the direction of the mind map.")
dict..setDesc(\"The tolerance of the sibling: .setDesc("The tolerance of the sibling node. Used to determine if a node is a valid child.")
dict..setDesc(\"The files that will be ignore: .setDesc("The files that will be ignored when auto layout. Use regex to filter the files.")
dict..setDesc(\"The gap between parent and ch: .setDesc("The gap between parent and child node")
dict..setDesc(\"Create a custom child node wi: .setDesc("Create a custom child node with link to it. But cannot be used with auto layout.")
dict..setDesc(\"If true, the node will be aut: .setDesc("If true, the node will be automatically resized when you edit the node.")
dict..setDesc(\"If true, the width of the nod: .setDesc("If true, the width of the node will be automatically resized when you edit the node.")
dict..setDesc(\"The max width of the node. If: .setDesc("The max width of the node. If the width of the node is greater than this value, the width of the node will be automatically resized to this value.")
